summary.para: Invokes the default accessibility action on a Shell item.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the accessibility role for a Shell item.

param.name: pvarRole
param.para: When this method returns, contains a that specifies the role.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method is called when the accessibility role for a Shell item is retrieved.

summary.para: Gets the default accessibility action for a Shell item.

param.name: pbstrDefaultAction
param.para: When this method returns, contains a BSTR that specifies the default, accessibility action.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or E_OUTOFMEMORY otherwise.

remarks.para: This method is called when the default accessibility action for a Shell item is retrieved.

summary.para: Exposes methods that perform accessibility actions on a Shell item from a namespace tree control.

remarks.para: This interface is used only by (CLSID_NameSpaceTreeControl).
